title: IBM to Acquire Apptio Inc., Providing Actionable Financial and Operational Insights Across Enterprise IT - PR Newswire
summary: IBM has announced its acquisition of Apptio Inc. for $4.6 billion to enhance its IT automation capabilities and optimize technology investments for clients. This acquisition aims to simplify visibility into technology spending across multi-cloud environments and integrate Apptio's offerings with IBMâ€™s existing technologies. Apptio, which is recognized as a leader in financial and operational IT management, will provide IBM with valuable insights from $450 billion of anonymized IT spend data. The deal is expected to strengthen synergies in various key growth areas for IBM.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 511210 - Software Publishers, 541512 - Computer Systems Design Services, 541519 - Other Computer Related Services, 541611 - Administrative Management and General Management Consulting Services.
